Postgame - Lv. 70 - Route 134: solve the strong current puzzle just west of Pacifidlog Town, and dive there. Go to the surface in front of the braille tablet, then open a door by using Dig in front of the braille tablet north of that new room.

Postgame - Lv. 70 - Go to Weather Institute, then ask the Scientist upstairs to tell where the current rainfall is in Hoenn. Go find the diving spot on the Route mentioned.
